thread.title: Great place to stay close to Time Square
thread.title_full: Great place to stay close to Time Square - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: afcajaxusa
title: Great place to stay close to Time Square
text:
Awesome small boutique type hotel. Service was excellent and there was plenty of amenities available for free. 24 hour coffee and drinks, non alcohol type, snacks.
Daily wine and alcoholic type drinks for free in the evening.
Location was excellent if you needed to be close to Time Square.
Staff went out of there way to assist with directions, services, and anything else that came up.
